properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
-BERY
1
Ry olom-bery,
Tsy manan-kery,
Fatoram-pahotana izao,
He ! misy vonjy,
Maty ho famonjena anao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Avia izao,
Sao neninao.
He ! indro mbola mivoha
Ny lanitra, hidiranao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Raha efa resy
Misesisesy
Ka kivy ny fanahinaol,
He ! misy vonjy !
Ao ny Mpamonjy.
Manolo-pandresena anao.
Avia izao, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Raha toa Satana
Mila hitana
Anao ho babony izao,
He ! misy vonjy,
Kristy Mpamonjy
Anao ho babony izao,
Avia izao, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tsy ela intsony
ho ao ambony
No hampidirana anao,
Ka mifalia,
Ny Rainao tia
Hamafa ranomasonao.
Ho sambatra,
haharitra,
Tsy hisy intsony ny ota
Voavelany ny helokao.
